column1: 12] I now consider the Right to Information regime succinctly. Section 3 of the
Right to Information Act, No. 12 of 2016, grants every citizen the right of access
to information, subject to the provisions of Section 5. It says;
“3. (1) Subject to the provisions of section 5 of this Act, every citizen shall
have  a  right  of  access  to  information  which  is  in  the  possession,
custody or control of a public authority.
(2)  The  provisions  of  this  Act,  shall  not  be  in  derogation  of  the  powers,
